title: Swing Blocks
description: Follow the music to enter a pleasurable practice, be patient and don't let the blocks fall from the platform! Challenge yourself with multiple levels and two different series!
instructions: Wait the perfect timing and touch to cut-off lines and throw the block.

title: Super Sort
description: Bring out the artists in you! Sort and fuse beads together to create fun and unique art pieces. Use your tweezers to carefully separate all the beads into their correct cups. Once the sorting is complete, use your iron to merge all the beads together and show your friends what you have just created! Enjoy!
instructions: Separate the beads and fuse them together! Add the new pictures to your collection!

title: Santa Gifts Rescue
description: Help Santa rescue and collect all the presents. At each level, you will find a new puzzle to solve in order to help Santa in his mission to bring joy and gifts for all the kids around the globe. Use your skills and find what pin you should take out. If you are looking for a good and relaxing game for Christmas 2022, then this one is for you. Have fun playing online Santa Gifts Rescue.
instructions: Use your mouse or touch-screen to play.

title: Pretty Tiles
description: In this HTML5 match puzzle game you should tap on three tiles with same shapes to destroy them. If you match three labeled tiles in the specified time you’ll get a reward.
instructions: Tap on three tiles with same shapes to destroy them

title: Emoji Word Puzzle
description: Emoji Word Puzzle is a new, funny, and addictive game! Solve the puzzles made of emojis. Guess the word encrypted with emojis and vice versa, write the word with emojis. Each level has a surprising riddle.
instructions: Touch on letter to place in correct place

title: Winter Bubbles
description: Welcome to Winter Bubbles, a classical bubble shooter game immersed in a winter wonderland! Your mission is to aim and release the candle to combine it with other similar candles. Your ultimate goal is to collect the Golden Bell within the allotted time. Be vigilant and prevent the candles from reaching the border. Plus, keep an eye out for various power-ups that can be activated by shooting a candle at them. Will you conquer the winter challenge? Give it a shot now!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Gold Coin Machine Master
description: Enjoy gold coin claw machine master and Go back to your childhood days and enter an arcade wonderland filled with coin claw machines, and giant spinning wheels. Enjoy a wide variety of gold coin collecting machine games, use your skills to get the best high score possible, and enjoy the prizes at this virtual fair
instructions: Play with a claw machine and get an authentic experience like you’ve seen in your childhood. Use the controls to bring the claw machine over the most attractive prize in the toys pile.

title: Space Hidden Alphawords
description: Welcome to Space Hidden AlphaWords, an educational hidden object game that explores astronomy and space research! Locate hidden alphabet letters to form space-related words while having fun and enhancing your knowledge. Share intriguing details with your kids and enjoy the thrill of discovery and learning in this captivating game!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Hex A Mong
description: In this adventure set in space, the spaceship crew organizes a tournament for some fun. Would you like to participate in this tournament? You have to run non-stop on the hexagonal panels on the special three-storey platform prepared with artificial gravity, you will fall down when you stop or slow down. Because every hexagon you touch disappears in about a second, you have to stay in this fun arena as long as possible. You have the right to fall twice. When you fall for the 3rd time, you lose the game. You can play the game alone or with a friend in 2-player mode.
instructions: Controls: Player 1 Move: WASD keys Jump: Q Player 2 Move: ARROW keys Jump: Space

title: Coffee Puzzle
description: Welcome to Coffee Puzzle - The place where animated characters, Match-3 and Puzzle meet in one exciting experience. It's a Match 3 puzzle evolution! Take your match-3 games skills to the next level and combine the elements with your quick thinking. Enjoy an ever-growing collection of unique levels.
instructions: Clear the path for the Coffee by matching three identical food elements. Assist the Coffee to get to their destination-into the desperate hands of coffee lovers :)

title: Paint House
description: White houses are boring. Bring the colors in and paint everything in seconds! To complete every level, paint all white spaces. Swipe left, right, up and down and fill all the empty spots! Every level is 100% possible to solve. Yet not everyone can do it! Are you up for the puzzle?
instructions: White houses are boring. Bring the colors in and paint everything in seconds! To complete every level, paint all white spaces. Swipe left, right, up and down and fill all the empty spots! Every level is 100% possible to solve. Yet not everyone can do it! Are you up for the puzzle?

title: Draw Blocks 3D
description: There are many squares in the game. Draw to create cubes that fill in the gaps. Block goes into cubes and you’re onto the next level. Time is limited to make the most correct choice!
instructions: Draw on screen

title: Winter Vacation
description: Fun, relaxing puzzle game with a winter theme. The goal of the game is to find chains of the same items on the board. There are also special goals listed on the bottom of the screen, which will give you more moves so you can play longer.
instructions: Click or tap on one object and than move to the same object next to the selected one.

title: Safe Circle Space
description: Tap simple game, but addictive. Save dot player in safe circle space. Tap on screen to change way of movement, avoid obstacles and get the best score.
instructions: Tap on screen

title: Slip Blocks
description: Slip Blocks is interesting puzzle game for kids.Your are cube of a certain color and you can move only on route along which dots a certain color as your cube. With the help of the control keys, you will have to indicate on which route it will have to move. Having reached the end point, your hero will enter the portal and be transported to the next level of the game.
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Build With Buddies
description: Roll the dice to earn resources. Use resources to build farms, forest, mines and quarry. The buildings generate more resources each turn. To win the game, build according to the objectives. Every round is different! Use strategy to outwit your friends in this strategy board game.
instructions: Roll dice and construct buildings in this multiplayer board game

title: Onnect Matching Puzzle
description: Onnect Matching Puzzle is a classical puzzle game! Your task is to put the same fruit block match successfully eliminated! The more pairs that match, the higher the score. Match the same block can only have three lines! At the same time, you should pay attention to the elimination of the box whether there is displacement! Come and try it!
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Santas Magic Christmas
description: Relax in this simple and fun jewel game. Help Santa collect lost gifts in the magical environment of the Christmas landscape. Use various power-ups to complete levels.
instructions: Match 3 or more baubles to destroy rows of baubles. Use power ups to destroy more baubles or combine 3 bags to unlock a random bomb. Combine 3 gifts to successfully complete a level.

title: Christmas Puzzle
description: A puzzle is a game, problem, or toy that tests a person's ingenuity or knowledge. In a puzzle, the solver is expected to put pieces together in a logical way, in order to arrive at the correct or fun solution of the puzzle.
instructions: You need to arrange so that these blocks are filled with horizontal or vertical goods, no holes in the row

title: Winter Warm Up Math
description: Welcome to Winter Math Warm-up, a brain-teasing math puzzle game! Your challenge is to determine the values of various winter items by solving provided equations. The equations involve addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. After you've found the values of the items, use them to answer straightforward math questions. If you need a little help, there's an option to use hints in the left panel. Sharpen your math skills and enjoy the winter math challenge!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Color Puzzle
description: Can you paint over the blocks following the example? Try it in a new game Color Puzzle! Move the stickmen and paint the board according to its color. Just relax and enjoy the game!
instructions: Tap to stickman and swipe. Follow reference for complete the level.

title: Awesome 4x4 Slider
description: Welcome to Awesome 4x4 Sliding, a thrilling picture puzzle sliding game! Your task is to rearrange pieces of awesome images to align them in the correct order. Simply touch or click a block to shift it to an adjacent blank space. Be aware that you'll lose points for each passing second, so strive to complete the puzzle wisely and save as many points as possible. Can you solve these sliding puzzles with skill and precision? Give it a try now!
instructions: Use Mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Unlimited Puzzles
description: Unlimited Puzzles is a free puzzle game with unlimited gallery of beautiful images from various categories. This is a high quality game and it is a good choice for fans of jigsaw puzzles for all ages. Also, you can create puzzles from your own photos stored on your device!
instructions: Select one of the images in the game library or on your device. Set the difficulty by choosing how many parts to split the image into. Move the pieces of the puzzle to the artboard to complete the whole image. You can adjust the transparency of the layout, change the scale of the working area, get hints.

title: Fastening Challenge
description: Welcome to the Fastening Challenge! Your task is to fasten two identical items moving in opposite lanes. Tap the screen when you spot matching items facing each other. Be careful not to fasten the wrong ones; it costs a life. Complete each level by fastening a specific number of items. You have 5 lives and limited time. Save lives and time for bonus points. Ready for the challenge? Try it now!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Save RED Square
description: Destroy all blocks (wood, glass) and save RED cube on the platform. Tap on obstacles and keep cube alive. Puzzle game with nice animations and sounds.
instructions: tap on obstacles

title: Sneak Out 3D
description: Blue wants to sneak out to play! Can you help him? Evaded the surveillance! Sneak out, you can also quietly take advantage of them not to notice, do not make a noise, so that they will not notice, or, quickly escape the test of your operation!
instructions: Slide to play.

title: Ghostly Jigsaw
description: Welcome to Ghostly Jigsaw, a fantastic puzzle game with a Halloween theme! Your objective is to drag and drop the picture pieces into their precise locations. You can choose between two modes: Easy mode with 24 pieces or Hard mode with 48 pieces. Challenge yourself to complete the picture before time runs out in this spooky puzzle adventure!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Halloween Puzzle
description: Halloween Puzzle Game is a simple remake of classic Lines matching game inspired by Halloween. Your task is to move little monsters in order to make a horizontal or vertical row of three or more matching tiles. You can move them along unblocked paths only. Try to make as many matches before the board gets full.
instructions: Use your mouse to play or tap the screen.

title: Halloween Find the Differences
description: In the game Halloween Find the Differences you will find a full search for differences on ten fascinating levels with Halloween theme. Do not click unnecessarily, if you click wrong three times the game will end. The difference found will be marked with a circle so that you do not return to it. The game will make you focus and become more attentive, the differences are small, barely discernible, you have to sweat to find them.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Pop Halloween
description: Pop Halloween is a simple and fun click puzzle game. Select 2 or more halloween items to match them. The more items you match in a single click - the more points you earn for every item. What's your best score?
instructions: Use mouse or tap to play this halloween games.

title: Ball Collector
description: There will be three targets on the bottom of the game. They will be yellow, pink and blue. A bomb will move in front of them, which you must not hit. In the main part of the game there will be very small colored balls with same colors as the targets. When some of the targets is free and the bomb is away from there click on the target to go all colored balls into that target. Try to collect more balls before bomb hit some of the balls and then the game will over.
instructions: Tap on targets to play this game.

title: Slidey Block Puzzle
description: Slidey Block Puzzle is a Puzzle game that is currently very popular. Slidey Block Puzzle is really simple, the player just needs to move the left or right slider to create and clear an entire line. Slidey Block Puzzle has two skins to choose from: the classic skin of the Nice Cat. Join the crazy adventure of Slidey Block Puzzle and enjoy!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Midnight Halloween Jigsaw
description: Midnight Halloween Jigsaw is a free online game in the jigsaw puzzle genre. You have 6 images in three modes to play. Choose one of the modes for the game that you previously choose and start it to play. Drag and drop the pieces to solve the puzzle and create an image. Enjoy, and have fun!
instructions: Use the mouse to play this game.

title: Halloween Party 2021 Puzzle
description: Play with 9 images in this perfect jigsaw puzzle game: Halloween Party 2021 Puzzle. All images is with the halloween 2021. Solve all puzzles and keep your brain sharp. You have four modes for each picture, 16 pieces, 36 pieces, 64 pieces and 100 pieces. Enjoy and have fun.
instructions: Use mouse to play this game.

title: Apocalyptic Disaster Hidden
description: Apocalyptic Disaster Hidden is a free online skill and hidden object game. Find out the hidden stars in the specified images. Each level has 10 hidden stars. There are 6 levels in total. The time is limited so be fast and find all hidden objects before time runs out. Clicking in the wrong place several times reduces the time by an additional 5 seconds. So, if you are ready start the game and have fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play or tap on the screen!

title: Halloween Faces Memory
description: To show how good your visual Halloween memory is. The task is to remember and then open identical scary faces in pairs. At the first level, there will be only two pairs. But on the tenth - twenty. At first, all the pictures will be open for a few seconds, so that you can remember their location. Then they will turn the same sides, and you will reopen them, deleting the pairs in Halloween Faces Memory.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Shadow Match Halloween
description: Welcome to Halloween Shadow Match! This game is both educational and entertaining, perfect for kids. Here's how it works: A photo is displayed in the left box, and your goal is to click on the correct shadow of that photo in the right panel. When you select the correct shadow, you'll earn 200 points. However, be careful! Clicking on the wrong shadow will deduct 40 points from your score. Test your observation skills and enjoy the Halloween-themed fun!
instructions: Tap the correct shadow using mouse or touch pad.

title: Halloween Hidden Objects
description: Welcome to Halloween Hidden Objects, a classic point-and-click hidden object game! Your objective is to find all the items listed in the picture on the left side of the screen. To earn bonus points, complete the level before time runs out. Can you spot all the hidden objects in this Halloween-themed challenge? Give it a try and test your observation skills now!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Color Maze Puzzle
description: Color Maze Puzzle is a maze game with 80 challenging levels. Swipe to move the ball and color all blocks. By overcoming some levels, new balls are unlocked to help you reach the end. Have a good time!
instructions: .One touch control. .Keyboard arrows. .Press R for Restart Layout

title: Halloween Puzzles
description: Welcome to the game called Halloween Puzzles! In this game you have 12 puzzles with pictures from Halloween characters. Assemble them by changing to place the pieces. To change drag parts up to another position. Completed a level, go to the next. In each level you have limited time for which need to complete it.
instructions: Use mouse or touch the screen!

title: Kobra vs Blocks
description: Control the Kobra's direction to collect items that will make its size increase, so you can destroy blocks with higher numbers! Make the highest score possible, but be careful: the number of lives on the block must be smaller than the Kobra's size!
instructions: Use the buttons in the screen OR use the keys AD or Arrows in Keyboard

title: Virus Shot
description: Destroy the virus that is all around you. In this game you have the opportunity to do that, but if you miss three times the game will end and the virus will win. The virus will move around you and you only have one syringe that rotates. You need to inject medicine at the right time to hit the virus. Tap on screen to inject medicine.
instructions: Tap on screen to play

title: Dot Rescue
description: Dot Rescue is a game where you need to control the ball. The goal at this game is to keep the ball live longer as you can. The ball will move in the circle and the shield will be at the half of the circle. The shield will rotate, so you need to avoid the shield. You will have only half circle to play.
instructions: Tap on screen to change position of the ball.

title: Dalgona Memory
description: This is a Memory Gamewith Dalgona Candies Figures, like: Star, Smile, Hexagon, Circle are eight different shapes! You can choose to play matches with 2 up to 8 pairs.
instructions: Touch in the candies to reveal them. Make the pairs !

title: Halloween Puzzle
description: A puzzle is also a game or toy in which you have to fit separate pieces together, or a problem or question which you have to answer by using your skill or knowledge
instructions: You need to arrange so that these blocks are filled with horizontal or vertical goods, no holes in the row

title: Birds Vs Blocks
description: Here we come with another cute game where you have to use your mind to make more score. Birds VS Blocks is a casual yet addictive game where little birdies are together and you have to help them in the way. The flock of birds have to go through the lowest number. Shield and bullets powers are added to make the game more interesting. With amazing Sfx it's fun to play Birds VS Blocks, let's start destroying some blocks now.
instructions: Drag to move the birds, destroy lowest numbers.

title: Find Different Pic Halloween
description: Welcome to "Find Different Pic Halloween," a challenging difference-finding puzzle game. In this game, you'll be presented with four images of Halloween. Three of them look exactly the same, but one is different. Sharpen your skills and use your keen eye to identify the image that stands out from the rest. Can you conquer all 40 challenges and become a Halloween puzzle master? Put your skills to the test and find those differences!
instructions: Use mouse or touch pad to play this game.

title: Memoji Puzzle
description: Guess memoji! New puzzle in which you need to match strangers one-by-one to phrases about their identities. Can you guess the personality by attribute, profession, emotion or achievement?
instructions: Just tap on the objects you want to match and complete the levels!

title: Daddy Rabbit
description: Daddy Rabbit must find all his lost babies inside the most amazing underground burrow you've ever seen. These baby rabbits sleep peacefully everywhere, but when daddy rabbit passes by, they will follow him all the way. Baby bunnies will follow dad but will cry if they are awake and his dad wanders too far. When that happens, the zombies will get upset and go straight to eat them. That's when daddy rabbit will defend his sons with a carrot punch and give those evil zombies what they deserve.
instructions: Move through the burrow by clicking on a place in the tunnel to go there, you can also use the arrows or the AWSD keys Shoot carrots at the zombies with the space bar and make your babies sleep with the B key.

title: Halloween Tiles
description: A Halloween themed collapse tile game. Clear the board by destroying tiles to collapse the columns. Receive Magic Pumpkins when the columns collapse and additional matches. Use these pumpkins to strategically destroy tiles when no matches are available.
instructions: Clear the board of all of the tiles by clicking 2 or more matching tiles that are adjacent to each other vertically or horizontally. The boards start out with tiles more than one deep. When the last tile in a stack is removed the tiles above it will drop down. If matches are made when the tiles drop you will get another Magic Pumpkin. Magic Pumpkns are used to destroy tiles when no matches are available. The amount of tiles in a stack can be determined by looking at the edge of the stack.
